title:
From Voice to Value: Leveraging AI to Enhance Spoken Online Reviews on
  the Go
authors:
Kavindu Ravishan, D\'aniel Szab\'o, Niels van Berkel, Aku Visuri,
  Chi-Lan Yang, Koji Yatani, Simo Hosio
abstract:
Online reviews help people make better decisions. Review platforms usually
depend on typed input, where leaving a good review requires significant effort
because users must carefully organize and articulate their thoughts. This may
discourage users from leaving comprehensive and high-quality reviews,
especially when they are on the go. To address this challenge, we developed
Vocalizer, a mobile application that enables users to provide reviews through
voice input, with enhancements from a large language model (LLM). In a
longitudinal study, we analysed user interactions with the app, focusing on
AI-driven features that help refine and improve reviews. Our findings show that
users frequently utilized the AI agent to add more detailed information to
their reviews. We also show how interactive AI features can improve users
self-efficacy and willingness to share reviews online. Finally, we discuss the
opportunities and challenges of integrating AI assistance into review-writing
systems.
